title: Studio in Brentwood - SS Appliances - Controlled Access - Quartz
posting_body: ['Welcome to gorgeous Barrington Avenue Apartments, situated in the elegant Brentwood area of Los Angeles.', 'Our community is known for its wonderful apartment homes and peaceful atmosphere.', 'With the 405 and 10 interstates close by, we are conveniently located just minutes away from Santa Monica and the beach, where fun and excitement awaits.', 'Our gorgeous community includes luxurious amenities such as a welcoming swimming pool, a well-equipped fitness center, and high speed internet access.', 'Live comfortably and luxuriously here at Barrington Avenue Apartments in Brentwood, California.', '708 South Barrington Avenue', 'Brentwood, CA', '90049', 'Community Amenities:', '- Minutes From Barrington Plaza and San Vicente', '- Access to Public Transportation', '- Gated Assigned Parking', '- Controlled Access', '- Close to the 405 Freeway', '- Laundry On-site', '- Beautiful Landscaping', '- Swimming Pool', '- High-Speed Internet Access', '- Fitness Center', 'Apartment Amenities:', '- Custom Countertop in Kitchen and Bathroom', '- Ceiling Fan(s)', '- Dishwasher', '- Disposal', '- Air Conditioning*', '- Upgraded Carpet', '- Stainless Steel Appliances*', '- Custom Flooring in Kitchen and Bath', '- Modern Window Treatments', '- Mirrored Closet Doors', '- Microwave', '- Refrigerator', '- Gas Range', '* With Select Apartment Homes', 'For more information Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information visit: <URL>/', 'Square ft. is approximate.', 'Price and availability are subject to change.', 'Interior Photos may not be of exact unit.', 'Cities: West Los Angeles, Beverly Hills, Holmby Hills, Mar Vista, Westwood, Santa Monica, Bel Air, Pacific Palisades']
